articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Karin Hendrikse)
articles.description: RSS is a classic technology that fetches content from websites and feeds it to anyone who subscribes to it with a URL. articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Eleanor Hecks)
articles.description: You can‚Äôt overstate the importance of accessible website design. By the same token, bottom-up philosophies are crucial in modern site-building. A detail-oriented approach makes it easier to serve a more diverse audience along several fronts. Making the most of this opportunity will both extend your reach to new niches and make the web a more equitable place.
articles.title: How A Bottom-Up Design Approach Enhances Site Accessibility

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Philip J√§genstedt)

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Victor Ponamariov)
